Action.author: vdods
Action.body: Many applications will likely use a very simple subset of the full configuration capabilities of Fabric and Fabric-CA, and so these common use cases should guide the design; making these common use cases the easiest way to use the SDK.

Action.author: bestbeforetoday
Action.body: This sounds similar to the enhancements proposed in FABN-692|https://jira.hyperledger.org/browse/FABN-692 . Your feedback there would be welcome.
